ISSUE.TITLE: Table create fails after table rename operation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Node: **v14.18.0** Arch: **x64** Platform: **win32** Docker: **false** Database: **mysql2** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.82.0** **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Open REST project using external db (sakila) 2. Rename table 3. Add new table using "Create new table" option in tab menu (circled below- see screenshot section) **Expected behavior** Table creation to succeed & UI to update associated contents. **Note that, if we use 'Create table' option in Project tree menu, it works** **Screenshots** ![table create icon](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86527202/142759758-5c826543-16ae-481e-aef1-1824fcdd6424.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: test(cypress): table rename verification Signed-off-by: Raju Udava <sivadstala@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: handle table new creation bug re #795 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
